Text: Following up please reply to confirm This is the LAST confirmation we will send please REPLY to confirm We recently received a subscription request for PostMasterDirectcom optin email lists We sent a confirmation email to you immediately afterwards but have not received a reply to that message If you wish to receive the requested free email from us simply REPLY to this message and well activate your account immediately Or you can click this URL confirmet Your subscription codes are E T If you did not submit a subscription request to us it is possible that someone is trying to subscribe you without your permission In that case you do not need to reply and you will not be added to any PostMasterDirectcom lists Thanks for your participation and we hope to serve you soon Just reply to validate your subscription request OPTIN Email Service
